title: Rosie the Riveter WWII Home Front National Historical Park: Permits & Reservations
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Permits & Reservations              Permits And Reservations       Large Group or School Group Reservations  Reservations are required for large group tours (10 or more) and for school group tours. For school groups, please provide at least a two week notice. Slots for school group tours fill up quickly during the year. For more information and to inquire about a reservation, please call the visitor center at 510-232-5050 ext. 0        Special Use Permits (Our Park) Application Requirements for Special Use Permits within Rosie the Riveter/WWII Home Front National Historical Park can be obtained by downloading the document in the link, below. You may also download permit forms for commercial filming. Please direct all questions and email all completed forms to: Jim MacDonald: Jim_MacDonald@nps.gov Special Use Permit Form (Long) Special Use Permit Form (Short)  Commercial Use Permit Form (Long) Commercial Use Permit Form (Short)       Special Use Permits (City of Richmond) Special Use Permits for City of Richmond Parks, please call (510) 620-6793.
